section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The sub element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the sub element is used in a chemical formula:
example.codeblock: <note>When cleaning, be sure to dilute the baking soda (NaHCO<sub>3</sub>) with water (H<sub>2</sub>O) before mixing in the vinegar (CH<sub>3</sub>COOH).</note>
